$eref.description: A statement identifying and describing the entity that is the subject of the ownership or control described in an ownership or control statement.
$eref.title: Entity statement

___annotations.description: Annotations about this statement or parts of this statement
___annotations.title: Annotations

___foundingDate.description: When was this entity founded, created or registered. Please provide as precise a date as possible in ISO 8601 format. When only the year or year and month is known, these can be given as YYYY or YYYY-MM.
___foundingDate.title: Founding date

___incorporatedInJurisdiction.description: Details on where this legal entity is incorporated
___incorporatedInJurisdiction.title: Incorporated In Jurisdiction

___dissolutionDate.description: If this entity is no longer active, provide the date on which it was disolved or ceased. Please provide as precise a date as possible in ISO 8601 format. When only the year or year and month is known, these can be given as YYYY or YYYY-MM.
___dissolutionDate.title: Dissolution date

___uri.description: Where a [persistent URI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Resource_Identifier) is available for this entity this should be included.
___uri.title: URI

___identifiers.description: One or more official identifiers for this entity. Where available, official registration numbers should be provided.
___identifiers.title: Identifiers

___source.description: The source of information about this entity.
___source.title: Source

___addresses.description: One or more addresses for this entity.
___addresses.title: Addresses

___name.description: The declared name of this entity.
___name.title: Entity name

___missingInfoReason.description: For EntityStatements with the type 'anonymousEntity' or 'unknownEntity' this field should contain an explanation of the reason that detailed information on the entity is not provided. This may be a standard descriptive phrase from the source system, or a free-text justification.
___missingInfoReason.title: Missing information reason(s)

___alternateNames.description: An array of other names this entity is known by.
___alternateNames.title: Alternative names

items.description: A name this entity is known by.
items.title: Name

___entityType.description: From the [entityType codelist](#entitytype). What kind of entity is this? The 'registeredEntity' code covers any legal entity created through an act of official registration, usually resulting in an identifier being assigned to the entity. The 'legalEntity' code covers other bodies with distinct legal personality (government departments, international institutions etc.).  The 'arrangement' code covers artificial entities, described in the data model for the purpose of associating one or more natural or legal persons together in an ownership or control relationship, but without implying that the parties to this arrangement have any other form of collective legal identity.
___entityType.title: Type

$eref.description: A person statement describes the information known about a natural person at a particular point in time, or from a given submission of information
$eref.title: Person statement

___birthDate.description: The date of birth for this individual. Please provide as precise a date as possible in ISO 8601 format. When only the year or year and month is known, these can be given as YYYY or YYYY-MM.
___birthDate.title: Date of birth

___annotations.description: Annotations about this statement or parts of this statement
___annotations.title: Annotations

___deathDate.description: If this individual is no longer alive, provide their date of death. Please provide as precise a date as possible in ISO 8601 format. When only the year or year and month is known, these can be given as YYYY or YYYY-MM.
___deathDate.title: Death date

___identifiers.description: One or more official identifiers for this perrson. Where available, official registration numbers should be provided.
___identifiers.title: Identifiers

___source.description: The source of the information that links the entity and the interested party, or that supports a null statement.
___source.title: Source

___addresses.description: One or more addresses for this entity.
___addresses.title: Addresses

___personType.description: Use the [personType codelist](#persontype). The ultimate beneficial owner of a legal entity is always a natural person. Where the beneficial owner has been identified, but information about them cannot be disclosed, use 'anonymousPerson'. Where the beneficial owner has not been clearly identified, use 'unknownPerson'. Where the beneficial owner has been identified use knownPerson.
___personType.title: Person type

___nationalities.description: An array of ISO 2-Digit country codes representing nationalities held by this individual.
___nationalities.title: Nationality

___pepStatus.description: One or more descriptions of this person's Politically-Exposed Person (PEP) status.
___pepStatus.title: Politically Exposed Person Status

___missingInfoReason.description: For PersonStatements with the type 'anonymousPerson' or 'unknownPerson' this field should contain an explanation of the reason that detailed information on the person is not provided. This may be a standard descriptive phrase from the source system, or a free-text justification.
___missingInfoReason.title: Missing information reason(s)

___names.description: One or more known names for this individual.
___names.title: Names

$eref.description: An ownership or control statement is made up of an entity, an interested party (a reference to an entity, natural person, arrangement or trust), details of the interest and provenance information for the statement.
$eref.title: Ownership or control Statement

_88InterestedParty.description: The interested party has some level of ownership or control over the entity referenced in this ownership or control statement. This should be described with reference to either an entity statement or person statement, or, where the interested party is unknown, details of why.
_88InterestedParty.title: Interested party

___describedByPersonStatement.description: A reference to a statement describing a natural person who has an ownership or control interest in the subject of this statement.
___describedByPersonStatement.title: Described by person statement

___unspecified.description: When confirmation has been provided that no interested party exists, where ownership and control information does not need to be provided, or where details of ownership and control are unknown, information explaining this should be given using the unspecified reason and description. Where there is a natural person with ownership or control, but their name or details are not known, or cannot be disclosed for some reason, unspecified should not be used, but instead a reference to a personStatement should be provided but identifying details of the person left blank.
___unspecified.title: Unspecified or unknown ownership and control

___description.description: Any supporting information about the absence of a confirmed beneficial owner. This field may be used to provide set phrases from a source system, or for a free-text explanation.
___description.title: Description

___reason.description: The reason that an interested party cannot be specified. From the [unspecifiedReason codelist](#unspecifiedreason).
___reason.title: Reason

___describedByEntityStatement.description: A reference to a statement describing a registered entity, trust or arrangement that has an ownership or control interest in the subject of this statement. An entityStatement should be used when the direct interests to be described represents known control or ownership by anyone other than a natural person.
___describedByEntityStatement.title: Described by entity statement

___statementType.description: This should always be set to `ownershipOrControlStatement`.
___statementType.title: Statement type

___annotations.description: Annotations about this statement or parts of this statement
___annotations.title: Annotations

___interests.description: A description of the interests held by the interestedParty covered by this statement in the entity covered by this statement.
___interests.title: Interests

___subject.description: The subject of an ownership or control relationship.
___subject.title: Subject

___describedByEntityStatement.description: Provide the identifier of the statement which describes the entity that the subject of an ownership or control interest.
___describedByEntityStatement.title: Described by entity statement

___source.description: The source of the information that links the entity and the interested party, or that supports a null statement.
___source.title: Source
